hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Razin Al-‘Uqaili that he came to the Prophet (ﷺ) and said:“O Messenger of Allah, my father is an old man and he cannot perform Hajj or ‘Umrah, and he is not able to ride the mount (due to old age).” He said: “Perform Hajj and ‘Umrah on behalf of your father.”

chapter.ara-name: باب الْحَجِّ عَنِ الْحَىِّ، إِذَا لَمْ يَسْتَطِعْ
chapter.eng-name: Performing Hajj on behalf of a living person if he is incapable himself
